HowToCreate__WhatToMind__1__Desc__eng: Stickers to post to Stipop must pass the review process. Please be sure to check the guidelines below before submitting the sticker, as the sticker for the following or possible causes may be rejected or interrupted.
HowToCreate__WhatToMind__2__Desc__eng:
1.1 If the image is not in the image format specified by Stipop
1.2 If a sticker image does not help the conversation
1.3 The sticker color is too light or is out of balance
1.4 If only a simple logo is included
1.5 If duplicates the sticker on the store
HowToCreate__WhatToMind__3__Desc__eng:
2.1 If the title contains an advertising slogan
2.2 If the deck contains a URL
2.3 If the contents are too short
2.4 Text conflicts with a sticker image
2.5 If the text contains typos or other errors
HowToCreate__WhatToMind__4__Desc__eng:
3.1 Contents that are against the general public including crime, violence, and sexual expression
3.2 Content with antisocial content
3.3 Controllable content
3.4 Contents that contain deprecating or discriminating against people, objects, and animals
3.5 Contents that are likely to cause frustration with a particular nationality, religion, culture, or group
HowToCreate__WhatToMind__5__Title__eng: 4. Purpose, including business and advertising promotion
HowToCreate__WhatToMind__5__Desc__eng:
4.1 Content that includes advertising copy
4.2 Content that is intended to be advertised by the company or by specific individual brands and services
4.3 Content that includes political elements, such as support for specific parties, the National Assembly, etc.
4.4 Content produced for the particular purpose of a particular group
HowToCreate__WhatToMind__6__Desc__eng: 5.1 Content subject to copyright infringement or suspected plagiarism of other products
HowToCreate__WhatToMind__7__Desc__eng: 6.1 If it can damage or damage the pop image
HowToCreate__WhatToMind__Warn__Desc__eng: * If not included in the above guide, you CAN NOT register an sticker that Stipop considers inappropriate, and sales may be discontinued after the store is complete.

Pricing__StickerPricingPolicy__1__Desc__:
You can sell your stickers at prices you want. Price choices currently available at Stipop are free/$0.99/$1.99/$2.99. There is a requirement (number of stickers in a package) to be met for certain price levels, so please check the specifics from table below.

Sticker Sales Price# of stickers in a package (required)
Free9, 12, 15, 18, 21, 24, 27, 30
$0.9915, 18, 21, 24, 27, 30
$1.99, $2.9924, 27, 30

With the new 3 day free trial option Stipop users can try any paid stickers before purchasing them. For sticker artists, this option will give higher conversion rates and help promote stickers.
*To share current market statistics on pricing stickers, 15% are free, 70% are $0.99 and the rest are priced $1.99 and $2.99. Having some free stickers will help expose your whole sticker board and get greater profit.
Pricing__StickerPricingPolicy__2__Desc__:
ãƒ»In general, 50% of total profit from paid sticker sales will be at your hand (this is after deducting 30% from in-App payment fee to
    Apple or Google).
ãƒ»The share will be sent to your Paypal Account which you can fill in at your artist main page(Both app and web).
ãƒ»When the share exceeds $10 you can make a request for the money and it will be sent to your Paypal account between 21st ~
    23rd of the next month.
ãƒ»The sharing can differ in cases of promotions executed by us which may lead to greater profit sharing for artists (artists will be
    noticed individually through email after uploading is done).
ãƒ»If you have any inquiries regarding this, please send us an email to help@stipop.io.

ãƒ»20 POPs: Purchase sticker package worth $1.99
ãƒ»30 POPs: Purchase sticker package worth $2.99
